title: Card Autofill Not Updating
content: I removed an old card from my Autofill details and added a new one but when I go to Autofill the details, it still shows the old card and the new one isn't there. In Google pay app it only shows the new one. I've restarted my phone but that hasn't updated it.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
